channel.title: Is my brother gay?
channel.description:
Well he just asked my mom for a pink wig so he could dress up like his favourite singer for halloween"next year"so since I wanted to know who it was I asked and he said Jeffree Star, Does this make him gay?
I mean he is 12 years old and pretty much acts like a girl most of the time, but he says he has a girlfriend who lives in New York. What do you all think?

item.title: Is my brother gay?
item.dc:creator: @Jessie_Feil Jessie Feil
item.description:
@Jessie_Feil wrote:

WHAT MONKEY SEE

MONKEY DO

Read full topic

@iz3_legend wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: Is my brother gay?
item.dc:creator: @buut15 buut15
item.description:
@buut15 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:60, topic:420196”]Just a bump he just asked this on facebook.
“hey is wanting to wear high heels going TOO far with my JStar outfit?”[/quote]
It’s just a costume, wanting to dress up as someone else does not make him gay. Maybe he’s a MTF? I don’t know, you don’t know, no one but him (maybe not even him) knows what he is. Acting like the stereotype of a gay male does not make him gay. I know a few gay/bi males that acts like they are “straight”. I was very shocked they was gay/bi.

So what have we learned today? You can never be sure of someones sexuality before asking them. As he is in his pre-teen to teen years, he most likely does not even know what his own sexuality is. Most people going through puberty has been confused about their sexuality at one point. Just wait and see. If he is, and wants you to know, he will tell you. Just stop asking him and let him tell you himself (if he is gay).

Read full topic

item.title: Is my brother gay?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Stork, post:62, topic:420196”]maybe u should ask him instead of posting on a fuckin bulletin board full of people who don’t know your brother.

special kid.[/quote]Well I have asked him but he denys it all the time. So I figured there would be people on here that would know signs of someone being gay, I mean who knows.

Also john I should try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Is my brother gay?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Nicholas_:

I’m gay. o.O

So am I…

@posters: How the hell do you guys keep getting off topic. Stop posting.

@topic: As some people have said before, you can’t really judge anything at this point in time, because he may be going through numerous phases and this may be one of them. Then again, he’s also too young. Wait it out and see what happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Is my brother gay?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:35, topic:420196”][quote=Epic Conversation]Krackkid’s Mom, “Hello who is this?”
GAY Representative, “May I speak to “Krackkid’s” Mother, Please?”
Krackkid’s Mom, “You are speaking to her?”
GAY Representative, “I Represent the Gay Alert y’Organization. We are sorry to inform you that your son is gay.”
Krackkid’s Mom, “OH NO! I knew that this would happen once he got into highschool and started hanging out with those people!”
GAY Representative, “Your son is in highscool?”
Krackkid’s Mom, “OH. Thank GOD that my older boy isn’t gay. I was worrying about him. You must be talking about my younger 12 year old son.”
GAY Representative, “Yes M’am.”
Krackkid’s Mom, “Thank you but that was already suspected.”
GAY Representative, “Oh alright. If you would please complete our customer satisfaction survey so we can improve our services, please do so!”[/quote] I love the epic climax! :|[/quote]
You… You just mind fucked me…

Read full topic
